Name: deli near info
Reason: I can never fully describe what it is... Is it a piece of fine art? Is it a digital collage? Or is it a visual forum? I dont know. Maybe more importantly... is there an end of this website? I also don't know.

Name: Forthcoming Studio
Reason: strong personal style | more is more

Name: GT Alpina by Grilli Type
Reason: Successfully showing the characteristics of the typeface in a fun and extremely interactive way. The website layout is also adorable.

Name: HyperText * Future Fonts Year One
Reason: A super fun way to archive typefaces. Also don't forget to click the home button and check other sites in the series!

Name: Sternberg Press
Reason: The random positioned 3d books on the landing page is so fun! It adds a lot to the interactive aspects of the website.

Name: Virgil Abloh
Reason: The old school style pop-up windows on the top is just too cute to be ignored. "Old fashion" is the new fashion.

Name: Space Type
Reason: A very tech-feeling interactive foundry page. You can never predict what's next.

Name: Torque Editions
Reason: A mind-map/miro vibe website which makes me feel that there are so many things to explore.

Name: Radio Amnion
Reason: One of the most romantic project I've ever seen: moon, sea, music, drowning...

Name: tilde.town
Reason: It's just cute to see an ASCII style of website. Exploring the archives is also fun.

Name: Amazing Show
Reason: The entry animation and the design of each page is crazy.

Name: Studio Lars HÃ¸ie
Reason: I like how physical engine is involved in web design.
